skillTree.localised_description: Astride his griffon, Sharpclaw, Althran swoops down on his chosen foe and cuts them down with talon and beak.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

skillTree.localised_description: Just like his ancestors, Althran looks beyond Ulthuan borders to ensure no foe sets foot upon her shores.

effects.description: Leadership: +10 when fighting against Vampire Counts, Vampire Coast and Tomb Kings
Leadership: +15 when fighting against Vampire Counts, Vampire Coast and Tomb Kings

Leadership: +5 when fighting against Skaven
	(Lord's army)
Weapon strength: +25% when fighting against Skaven

skillTree.localised_description: The world descends into Chaos and she will never be tamed! But Ulthuan does not have to share this mortal fate.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Chaos Dwarfs and Norsca
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Dark Elves
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Chaos Dwarfs and Norsca
Weapon strength: +25% when fighting against Dark Elves

Leadership: +5 when fighting against Dark Elves
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The Trickster God knows all manner of ploys and ruses that can be used to counter missile attacks.
Knowledge can be used as a shield against magical attack.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The sword is the axis of the world and its power is absolute.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
Panic and fear are things that happen to others.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Dark Elves
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Greenskins, Skaven, Dark Elves, Beastmen, Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos and Norsca

skillTree.localised_description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
Capable of reactions so fast, Althran makes even the quickest Swordmaster of Hoeth look clumsy in comparison.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
This finely crafted medallion has been passed down through the Stormriders for generations. Preserved with tempestuous magical knowledge, it was a gift from the Mages of Hoeth long ago.

target_if: Not on or below a platform

skillTree.localised_description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Turning an untrained bunch of regular citizens into effective fighting units requires a special kind of talent, and oodles of patience.

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord belts out orders and can be heard even across a battlefield smothered in the grim noise of war.
Personal glory and regimental achievement must be set aside in times of great peril.

skillTree.localised_description: Knowing that it is the rare plan that survives contact with the enemy, yet being prepared for all eventualities, raises this one above mere planners.

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.
The Lords rule, the peasants toil. Nothing has changed in over a thousand years.
The presence of this Lord ensures a measure of calm, reducing panic and desertion amongst followers.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Through our acts, the gods will cleanse the lands.
It is said that Sigmar would bear a mortal wound and carry on fighting; this champion follows the hallowed Warrior-God.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Someone has to ensure the numbers and quality of recruits remain high.
A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.
The ancient Asur arts teach one how to heal as well as how to harm.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Countless conflicts and a keen sense of awareness have made this Lord difficult to entrap.

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +5%
Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +10%

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

factionEffects.localised_description: The Citadel of Dusk is a site of tremendous strategic importance as it allows the Asuryan navy to patrol, protect and ultimately control the western sea trade routes to Cathay and Nippon whilst suppressing the threat of Druchii corsairs & undead pirates to Ulthuan.

effects.description: Receive bonuses or penalties depending on if Eataine and key regions in Lustria are held by High Elves or your Military Allies.
The Citadel of Dusk is invisible to all, save those who serve within its walls, as such the enemy will target your capital less frequently.
Contact with Lothern and the Cathayan port regions of Hanyu Port and Li Zhu.
Your regions visited by any High Elf Legendary Lord leaves temporary bonuses.

items.colour_text: The Starblade, like its lance variant, is forged from the metal of a fallen star, the weapon's graceful lines belie the formidable power it grants its wielder.
This magical Armour of Fortune is an ancient family heirloom, and so beautifully crafted that the wearer's freedom of movement is completely unimpaired.
This finely crafted medallion has been passed down through the Stormriders for generations. Preserved with tempestuous magical knowledge, it was a gift from the Mages of Hoeth long ago.

target_if: Not on or below a platform

backgroundSkills.localised_description: With an ancestry dating back to the first Phoenix Kings, Althran's ancestors have led Asuryan armies all around the world, earning great glory and renown. Althran is determined to carry on this grand tradition, and will stop at nothing to protect his people and the domains of Ulthuan.

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

Hero action cost: -50% for Nobles
	(local province)

Hero action success chance: +10% for Nobles
	(local province)

Immune to High Seas, Reef and Storm attrition
	(Lord's army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This magical Armour of Fortune is an ancient family heirloom, and so beautifully crafted that the wearer's freedom of movement is completely unimpaired.
The Starblade like its lance variant is forged from the metal of a fallen star, the weapon's graceful lines belie the formidable power it grants its wielder.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle
